thread.title: ‘Buoyant’ Britain hits employment BOOM in MAJOR Brexit boost, report claims
thread.title_full: ‘Buoyant’ Britain hits employment BOOM in MAJOR Brexit boost, report claims

title: ‘Buoyant’ Britain hits employment BOOM in MAJOR Brexit boost, report claims
text:
‘Buoyant’ Britain hits employment BOOM in MAJOR Brexit boost, report claims ‘Buoyant’ Britain hits employment BOOM in MAJOR Brexit boost, report claims BRITAIN’S employment market has soared to “buoyant” heights over the last year, in spite of a “politically uncertain” year, a report has claimed. PUBLISHED: 01:09, Mon, Feb 6, 2017 | UPDATED: 01:12, Mon, Feb 6, 2017 GETTY UK manufacturing jobs market has experienced a boom during Brexit era 
According to a study by Reed, the employment agency, manufacturing jobs have increased by almost a quarter in the past year. 
In particular; construction, engineering and retail sectors have experienced strong employment growth. Related articles BREXIT BOOST: British manufacturer optimism SOARS as car-makers ann... 
James Reed, chairman of reed.co.uk, said: "There's a lot of uncertainty in world politics at the moment, but our data shows that in spite of everything, the UK jobs market remains buoyant. 
"Manufacturing is key to prosperity and as such is a vital part of any economy and that is why these figures are so encouraging. 
"This is not a one-off either. The sector has been going in the right direction for some months now, which is reassuring news." May's Brexit speech: World reacts LIVE Tue, January 17, 2017 Politicians and celebrities tweet their reaction as Theresa May unveils her 12 point plan for Britain leaving the EU.
